name: Dog's Pistachio
description:
Ever wanted to deliver pistachios?

Well probably not but play along

Wait no more! because you can now do that right from your home

You are a humble delivery boy/girl with a humble truck.

You work under a humble employer who runs the only Pistachios resturant in town

Dog's Pistachios(Strange name don't ask because I need to make up a story about it

but I am lazy)

Dog's PistachiosGameplay:

As far as  gameplay goes there are two game modes:

  • Hardcore for the real gamers(and those who want to question our sanity)
Hardcore mode
  • And a more laid back Casual mode
Casual mode

As for the timers:

  • We got speed running(psst post a youtube video about yourself completing the  game in record time and get a change to feature in this page )
  • And count down mode where you need to deliver all the packages before the time ends

Tip: Move through the long yellow pillars to deliver your package

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to control the truck

Developers:

Aenjo: Check him out on youtube

KittyCat: Check him out on youtube

Hall of records:

You can get your name here by submitting a youtube video of you completing 

a speedrun in record time
